{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DIR-867 |revision=A1 |series=AC1750 |asin=B0754LGR2N |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=SGE (T&W) |manuf_model=AP-MTKH7 |manuf_rev=-0002 |price=90 |est_release_date=2/27/2018 |fcc_date=11/14/2017 |fcc_id=KA2IR867A1 |pcb_id=AP-MTKH7-0002 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621AT;MEDIATEK, MT7621AT, 1649-AMTH, CTPBFW25, DTPBWN05; |cpu1_cspeed=880 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12805D |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC64M16GP-DI |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7615N;MEDIATEK, ARM, MT7615N, 1715-BFSL, ACMS9466; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7615N;MEDIATEK, ARM, MT7615N, 1715-BFSL, ACMS9466; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |addl_chips=5GHz RF Front End Module;Qorvo (RFMD);RFFM4552;Q, 4552, CFBFG;3; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.3;Ralink 5.0.0.0; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, |default_ssid=dlink-XXXX, |default_user=Admin }}
:• '''1300''' Mbps - 3SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''450''' Mbps - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1750 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1750 MU-MIMO Wi-Fi Gigabit Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://us.dlink.com/en/products/dir-867-d-link-wifi-router-ac1750-mu-mimo-gigabit}} {{SupportPage|vendor=D-Link|model=DIR-867-US}} "AP-MTKH7-0002 REV1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. * Web GUI: http://dlinkrouter.local./ This is identical to the [[D-Link DIR-878 rev A1]] and [[D-Link DIR-882 rev A1]] except certain :components are removed to actually limit the device to three-stream operation. Apparently 256QAM is disabled, likely in order to differentiate this product from DIR-878.
